::: {=html}
<style>
  /* Remove page padding so iframe can sit flush */
  .quarto-title-block, .page-content, .content, main, .quarto-container, body {
    margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; max-width: 100% !important;
  }
</style>

<!-- Full-bleed iframe; offset for navbar height -->
<iframe
  src="https://andrewkates.shinyapps.io/ForcePlateDashboard2025/"
  style="
    display:block;
    width:100vw;
    margin-left: calc(50% - 50vw);
    margin-right: calc(50% - 50vw);
    margin-top: 72px;                 /* navbar height */
    height: calc(100vh - 72px);       /* viewport minus navbar */
    border:0;"
  loading="lazy"
></iframe>
:::
